== Mavelikkara (M) (803302) ==

Mavelikkara (M) is a town in the [[Mavelikkara]] taluka of [[Alappuzha]] district with an area of 12.65 sq. km. and harbouring 7184 households with total population of 26421 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Alappuzha]] is at a distance of 44 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 124 km. Male population is 12070 and female population is 14351. Scheduled Caste population is 3776 and Scheduled Tribes population is 27. Census Location Code of the town is 803302<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class III (population_total 20,000 to 49,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Municipality'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Alappuzha (m + og) at a distance of 44 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kochi (m corp. + og)  at a distance of 97 km. Railway station is at Mavelikkara at a distance of 0 km.
